snippet: Customs inspectors at Los Angeles International Airport seized a shipment of several dozen live giant African snails.
abstract: Customs inspectors at Los Angeles International Airport seize shipment of several dozen live giant African snails, considered a delicacy in Nigeria but also voracious pets that can eat paint and stucco off houses.
lead_paragraph: Customs inspectors at Los Angeles International Airport seized a shipment of several dozen live giant African snails.

headline.main: California: Giant Snails Seized at Airport
headline.print_headline: California: Giant Snails Seized at Airport
